text: Na tekh, kotoryye uverovali i vershili dobryye dela, net grekha za to, chto oni yeli [v proshlom nedozvolennoye], yesli oni [ostayutsya] bogoboyaznennymi, veruyut [v Allakha] i vershat dobryye dela, da, yesli oni bogoboyaznenny i veruyut, da, yesli bogoboyaznenny i delayut dobro, ibo Allakh lyubit tvoryashchikh dobro
